value.title: Introducing Azure Monitor for SAP Solutions | Azure Friday
value.excerpt: Azure Monitor for SAP Solutions is an Azure-native monitoring solution for customers running their SAP landscapes on Azure. value.title: Unified alerts in Azure Monitor | Azure Friday
value.excerpt: Kiran Madnani chats with Scott Hanselman about Azure Monitor, where you can set up alerts to monitor the metrics and log data for the entire stack across your infrastructure, application, and Azure platform. value.title: What is Azure DevOps? | One Dev Question: Abel Wang
value.excerpt: In the One Dev Question series, Cloud Developer Advocate Abel Wang explains how Azure DevOps provides developer services to support teams to plan work, collaborate on code development, and build and deploy applications. In this video, Abel explains the five parts of Azure DevOps.   Get more information
